entities.name: harry
entities.description: The main character who is woken up by a loud noise. He is disoriented in the darkness and fumbles with his hangings.

entities.name: seamus finnigan
entities.description: A student who is sleeping in the same dormitory as Harry. He asks what's going on when he hears a loud noise.

entities.name: ron weasley
entities.description: One of Harry's friends who is also woken up by the loud noise. He claims that Sirius Black slashed his curtains.

entities.name: sirius black
entities.description: A person who is accused of slashing Ron's curtains and waking him up. His name is mentioned as a source of fear for Harry and his friends.

entities.name: dean thomas
entities.description: A student who lights his lamp to see what's going on in the dormitory.

relationships.description: Harry hears Seamus Finnigan's voice from the other side of the room.
Ron accuses Sirius Black of slashing his curtains and waking him up.
Dean Thomas lights his lamp to help Harry see what's going on in the dormitory.
